passages.name: In The Garden
passages.text:
**sun
@eon_wakeUp_human @sfx_yawn
Sun is rising, birds chirping already calling for the new day.
Eon slowly opened her eyes to a shiny morning.
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[What a lovely day to spend at the garden!]
She wakes up saying the same thing every morning.
[[Human|Breakfast]]
passages.cleanText:
**sun
@eon_wakeUp_human @sfx_yawn
Sun is rising, birds chirping already calling for the new day.
Eon slowly opened her eyes to a shiny morning.
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[What a lovely day to spend at the garden!]
She wakes up saying the same thing every morning.

passages.name: Breakfast
passages.text:
**sun
@eon_walk_human @sfx_whistle
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[A good day starts with good breakfast!]
She walks through the garden browsing the fruit trees.
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Hmm, what shall I eat this morning? Pears or oranges? Or maybe some apricots?]
[[Human|Peach]]
passages.cleanText:
**sun
@eon_walk_human @sfx_whistle
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[A good day starts with good breakfast!]
She walks through the garden browsing the fruit trees.
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Hmm, what shall I eat this morning? Pears or oranges? Or maybe some apricots?]

passages.name: Peach
passages.text:
**peach
@eon_happy_lion
Her search stops when her eyes spotted a juicy peach. @sfx_snake
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Here is my breakfast!]
As she is reaching to grab it, a mysterious voice confronts her.
Voice: (text-colour:"red")[Arghh, same ridiculous routine every morning. Aren't you bored yet?] 
[[Lion|Come Out]]
[[Ox| Who]]
[[Human|Where]]
passages.cleanText:
**peach
@eon_happy_lion
Her search stops when her eyes spotted a juicy peach. @sfx_snake
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Here is my breakfast!]
As she is reaching to grab it, a mysterious voice confronts her.
Voice: (text-colour:"red")[Arghh, same ridiculous routine every morning. Aren't you bored yet?]

passages.name: Come Out
passages.text:
**exxMark
@eon_unhappy_lion
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Who is dis? Come out!] 
Voice: (text-colour:"red")[I see you are a little stressed. Sorry for interrupting your lil' boring breakfast routine.] @sfx_snake
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[I said come out!]
[[Lion|Anxious]]
passages.cleanText:
**exxMark
@eon_unhappy_lion
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Who is dis? Come out!] 
Voice: (text-colour:"red")[I see you are a little stressed. Sorry for interrupting your lil' boring breakfast routine.] @sfx_snake
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[I said come out!]

passages.name: Who
passages.text:
**questionMark
@eon_anxious_ox
Eon didn't expect someone else to be around.
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Who is that?]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[Just someone who is bored of watching the same silly routine every morning.]
[[Ox|Explain]]
[[Lion|Anxious]]
passages.cleanText:
**questionMark
@eon_anxious_ox
Eon didn't expect someone else to be around.
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Who is that?]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[Just someone who is bored of watching the same silly routine every morning.]

passages.name: Explain
passages.text:
**dialog
@eon_lookAround_ox
She is looking around but seeing no one.
Eon:(text-colour:"blue")[What do you mean?]
Voice: (text-colour:"red")[Poor kid...Every morning, you get up, say that it's the perfect day to spend in the garden. Then you try to decide between fruits for your breakfast, and end up grabbing a peach.]
[[Ox|Please]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialog
@eon_lookAround_ox
She is looking around but seeing no one.
Eon:(text-colour:"blue")[What do you mean?]
Voice: (text-colour:"red")[Poor kid...Every morning, you get up, say that it's the perfect day to spend in the garden. Then you try to decide between fruits for your breakfast, and end up grabbing a peach.]

passages.name: Please
passages.text:
**dialog
@eon_lookAround_ox
Eon is still searching for the owner of the mysterious voice.
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[That is not true, I ate an apple yesterday.]
The voice laughs hysterically. sfx_evilLaughter
Voice: (text-colour:"red")[Oh, poor child, I only feel sorry for you.]
[[Ox|Up]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialog
@eon_lookAround_ox
Eon is still searching for the owner of the mysterious voice.
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[That is not true, I ate an apple yesterday.]
The voice laughs hysterically. sfx_evilLaughter
Voice: (text-colour:"red")[Oh, poor child, I only feel sorry for you.]

passages.name: Up
passages.text:
**eyes
@eon_lookAround_ox
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Can you please show yourself? You are making me anxious.]
Voice: (text-colour:"red")[That is the last thing I'd like to do.]
Eon hears a slow crouching sound first. Then a subtle deep sound. 
Voice: (text-colour:"red")[Look up you fool!]
As Eon moves her gaze upwards, she sees two bright eyes in between leaves.
The eyes slowly slide down through the tree's trunk.
[[Ox|Serpent]]
passages.cleanText:
**eyes
@eon_lookAround_ox
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Can you please show yourself? You are making me anxious.]
Voice: (text-colour:"red")[That is the last thing I'd like to do.]
Eon hears a slow crouching sound first. Then a subtle deep sound. 
Voice: (text-colour:"red")[Look up you fool!]
As Eon moves her gaze upwards, she sees two bright eyes in between leaves.
The eyes slowly slide down through the tree's trunk.

passages.name: Serpent
passages.text:
**serpent
@eon_surprised_ox @sfx_snake
Eon has never seen something like this before.
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[What are you? You look nothing like me or anything.]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[I am a serpent, child. I've been living here in the shadows, observing you and your routine every day.]
[[Ox|Why]]
passages.cleanText:
**serpent
@eon_surprised_ox @sfx_snake
Eon has never seen something like this before.
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[What are you? You look nothing like me or anything.]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[I am a serpent, child. I've been living here in the shadows, observing you and your routine every day.]

passages.name: Anxious
passages.text:
**dialogue
@eon_lookAround_lion
Eon is searching for a face but can't see anyone.
Voice: (text-colour:"red")[Don't be anxious kid, there is no reason to be scared!]
Eon:(text-colour:"blue")[I am not scared! But in fact, I believe you are since you're the one who is hiding.] 
Voice: (text-colour:"red")[Well, if I come out, you need to face the truth. Do you think you're ready for that?]
[[Lion|No Fear]]
[[Ox|Explain]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialogue
@eon_lookAround_lion
Eon is searching for a face but can't see anyone.
Voice: (text-colour:"red")[Don't be anxious kid, there is no reason to be scared!]
Eon:(text-colour:"blue")[I am not scared! But in fact, I believe you are since you're the one who is hiding.] 
Voice: (text-colour:"red")[Well, if I come out, you need to face the truth. Do you think you're ready for that?]

passages.name: No Fear
passages.text:
**dialogue
@eon_angry_lion
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[I have no fear of you or what you can tell me. Now come out and show me your face!]
Voice: (text-colour:"red")[Okay, you asked for it.]
Eon hears a slow crouching sound first. Then a subtle deep sound. @sfx_snake
[[Lion|Hi]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialogue
@eon_angry_lion
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[I have no fear of you or what you can tell me. Now come out and show me your face!]
Voice: (text-colour:"red")[Okay, you asked for it.]
Eon hears a slow crouching sound first. Then a subtle deep sound. @sfx_snake

passages.name: Hi
passages.text:
**serpent
@eon_surprised_lion
A long body slowly slides down through the tree's stem.
Eon has never seen a creature like this before.
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[What are you exactly?]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[Hi kid, I am the Serpent. And I am here to wake you up from this ridiculous dream.]
[[Lion|Straight]]
[[Ox|Why]]
passages.cleanText:
**serpent
@eon_surprised_lion
A long body slowly slides down through the tree's stem.
Eon has never seen a creature like this before.
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[What are you exactly?]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[Hi kid, I am the Serpent. And I am here to wake you up from this ridiculous dream.]

passages.name: Why
passages.text:
**dialog
@eon_confused_ox
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[But why would you do that? You don't know me...]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[Because they have been lying to you. And you deserve better than that.]
[[Ox|About]]
[[Eagle|Deserve]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialog
@eon_confused_ox
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[But why would you do that? You don't know me...]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[Because they have been lying to you. And you deserve better than that.]

passages.name: About
passages.text:
**dialog
Eon feels chills on her body.
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[What are they lying about?]
Serpent pauses for a moment. He seems to enjoy this conversation though. 
He whispers in devilous tunes. 
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[Your whole life.]
[[Ox|No]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialog
Eon feels chills on her body.
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[What are they lying about?]
Serpent pauses for a moment. He seems to enjoy this conversation though. 
He whispers in devilous tunes. 
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[Your whole life.]

passages.name: Deserve
passages.text:
**recycle
@eon_think_ox
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[How do you know I deserve better? You don't know me.]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[You are smart kid. I like that. That's true, but I know your father. I know his intentions. He is making you live the same day over and over again. Forever!]
[[Eagle|Tell me]]
[[Ox|No]]
passages.cleanText:
**recycle
@eon_think_ox
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[How do you know I deserve better? You don't know me.]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[You are smart kid. I like that. That's true, but I know your father. I know his intentions. He is making you live the same day over and over again. Forever!]

passages.name: Tell me
passages.text:
**apple
@eon_think_eagle
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[And what are his intentions with this? Why is he making me live in a loop?] @sfx_creepyWhisper
Serpent whispers with a devilous smile:
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[He doesn't want you to taste the apple.]
[[Eagle|Apple]]
passages.cleanText:
**apple
@eon_think_eagle
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[And what are his intentions with this? Why is he making me live in a loop?] @sfx_creepyWhisper
Serpent whispers with a devilous smile:
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[He doesn't want you to taste the apple.]

passages.name: No
passages.text:
**dialog
This just sounds too horrible to be true. @eon_disagree_ox
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[No, he wouldn't do that! He loves me!
The serpent rolls his eyes.]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[Ah, the things we do for love... Though, I think that expressions if for a different context.]
[[Ox||Loops]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialog
This just sounds too horrible to be true. @eon_disagree_ox
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[No, he wouldn't do that! He loves me!
The serpent rolls his eyes.]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[Ah, the things we do for love... Though, I think that expressions if for a different context.]

passages.name: Straight
passages.text:
**recycle
@eon_disappointed_lion
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[I am tired of these games. Just tell me what's happening.]
Serpent seems to enjoy Eon's impatience.
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[It breaks my heart to say this, but your whole life here is a lie. You believe time is passing, that every day is a new one. But in reality, you've been waking up to the same morning every day and go through the same events over and over again. You've been eating a peach for breakfast forever.]
[[Lion|Lying]]
[[Eagle|Tell me]]
passages.cleanText:
**recycle
@eon_disappointed_lion
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[I am tired of these games. Just tell me what's happening.]
Serpent seems to enjoy Eon's impatience.
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[It breaks my heart to say this, but your whole life here is a lie. You believe time is passing, that every day is a new one. But in reality, you've been waking up to the same morning every day and go through the same events over and over again. You've been eating a peach for breakfast forever.]

passages.name: Lying
passages.text:
*apple
@eon_angry_lion
Eon feels a rising fire inside.
Eon: That is not true. You are lying!
Serpent: I'm not. Why would I do that?
Eon: Why would they do that?
Serpent: Because they don't want you to taste the apple.
[[Lion|Away]]
[[Eagle|Apple]]
passages.cleanText:
*apple
@eon_angry_lion
Eon feels a rising fire inside.
Eon: That is not true. You are lying!
Serpent: I'm not. Why would I do that?
Eon: Why would they do that?
Serpent: Because they don't want you to taste the apple.

passages.name: Away
passages.text:
**dialog
@eon_disappointed_lion
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Just go away, I can't deal with your nonsense anymore.]
Serpent looks uncomfortable.
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[It's not nonsense! I am telling you the truth! I am trying to save you!]
[[Lion|Walk]]
[[Eagle|Warning]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialog
@eon_disappointed_lion
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Just go away, I can't deal with your nonsense anymore.]
Serpent looks uncomfortable.
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[It's not nonsense! I am telling you the truth! I am trying to save you!]

passages.name: Apple
passages.text:
**apple
@eon_confused_eagle
Eon doesn't really understand.
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[What is special about the apple? It's just another fruit.]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[No, that is not true. Apple contains a very special ingredient that will open up your senses. But once you have it, you can never go back.]
[[Eagle|Before]]
[[Ox|Prove]]
[[Lion|Away]]
passages.cleanText:
**apple
@eon_confused_eagle
Eon doesn't really understand.
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[What is special about the apple? It's just another fruit.]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[No, that is not true. Apple contains a very special ingredient that will open up your senses. But once you have it, you can never go back.]

passages.name: Where
passages.text:
**questionMark
@eon_confused_human
This was quite unexpected.
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Hey, where are you? Who is talking to me?]
Voice: (text-colour:"red")[Just a friendly stranger who is notorious to stand up against injustice.]
[[Human|Face]]
[[Ox|Explain]]
[[Lion|Anxious]]
passages.cleanText:
**questionMark
@eon_confused_human
This was quite unexpected.
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Hey, where are you? Who is talking to me?]
Voice: (text-colour:"red")[Just a friendly stranger who is notorious to stand up against injustice.]

passages.name: Face
passages.text:
**dialog
@eon_lookAround_human
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[So, you wanna see who I am. Very well, I'm coming down.]
Eon is looking around, then she hears leaves rustling on the peach tree. As she looks up, she sees something long crawling down around the trunk of the tree.
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[Hello stranger. Nice to meet you.] 
[[Human|Hello]]
[[Ox|Serpent]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialog
@eon_lookAround_human
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[So, you wanna see who I am. Very well, I'm coming down.]
Eon is looking around, then she hears leaves rustling on the peach tree. As she looks up, she sees something long crawling down around the trunk of the tree.
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[Hello stranger. Nice to meet you.]

passages.name: Hello
passages.text:
**serpent
@eon_confused_human @sfx_snake
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Hello, but...Who are you?]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[I am the serpent child. No need to worry I am your friend. And I am here to reveal the bitter truth to you.]
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Truth?]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[You've been living a lie this whole time.]
[[Lion|Straight]]
[[Ox|Why]]
passages.cleanText:
**serpent
@eon_confused_human @sfx_snake
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Hello, but...Who are you?]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[I am the serpent child. No need to worry I am your friend. And I am here to reveal the bitter truth to you.]
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Truth?]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[You've been living a lie this whole time.]

passages.name: Before
passages.text:
**dialog
@eon_talk_eagle
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[So you are saying that my memory of eating the apple is false.]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[Yes.]
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[And if I eat the apple, I'll change forever.]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[Correct.]
[[Eagle|Outcast]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialog
@eon_talk_eagle
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[So you are saying that my memory of eating the apple is false.]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[Yes.]
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[And if I eat the apple, I'll change forever.]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[Correct.]

passages.name: Outcast
passages.text:
**dialog
@eon_think_eagle
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Did you have it before?]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[Yes, that's why I am here now telling you the truth.]
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Why were you hiding in the tree?]
Serpent lowers his voice.
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[Because I am actually not allowed to be here. They kicked me out after I disobeyed him and ate the apple.]
[[Eagle|Trick]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialog
@eon_think_eagle
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Did you have it before?]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[Yes, that's why I am here now telling you the truth.]
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Why were you hiding in the tree?]
Serpent lowers his voice.
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[Because I am actually not allowed to be here. They kicked me out after I disobeyed him and ate the apple.]

passages.name: Trick
passages.text:
**questionMark
@eon_suspicious_eagle
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[So, I'll be kicked out as well. Why would I do that?]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[To live free of course! Make a life of your own!]
[[Eagle|Warning]]
[[Lion|Walk]]
passages.cleanText:
**questionMark
@eon_suspicious_eagle
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[So, I'll be kicked out as well. Why would I do that?]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[To live free of course! Make a life of your own!]

passages.name: Guards
passages.text:
**warning
@eon_anxious_eagle
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Guards!]
Serpent looks to Eon in shock. 
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[What the...]
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Sorry pal, but I warned you.]
[[Eagle|Cherubs]]
passages.cleanText:
**warning
@eon_anxious_eagle
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Guards!]
Serpent looks to Eon in shock. 
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[What the...]
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Sorry pal, but I warned you.]

passages.name: Cherubs
passages.text:
**nightstick
@eon_disappointed_eagle @sfx_flute
Two cherubs appear next to the Serpent.
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[Oh man, not again...]
Cherub 1: (text-colour:"deeppink")[Well, I agree! You gotta stop coming back in. You don't belong here.]
Cherub 2: (text-colour:"forestgreen")[Hey, I think you're good here so I'm just gonna go.]
Cherub 1: (text-colour:"deeppink")[Okay man, no worries.]
[[Eagle|Bye]]
passages.cleanText:
**nightstick
@eon_disappointed_eagle @sfx_flute
Two cherubs appear next to the Serpent.
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[Oh man, not again...]
Cherub 1: (text-colour:"deeppink")[Well, I agree! You gotta stop coming back in. You don't belong here.]
Cherub 2: (text-colour:"forestgreen")[Hey, I think you're good here so I'm just gonna go.]
Cherub 1: (text-colour:"deeppink")[Okay man, no worries.]

passages.name: Bye
passages.text:
**exxMark
@eon_disappointed_eagle
Cherub 1 grabs the serpent. 
Cherub 1: (text-colour:"deeppink")[Thank you for calling us. I hope he didn't disturb you much with his nonsense.]
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[I'm okay. Thank you for coming.]
The Serpent screams as they take him away:
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[THIS IS NOT OVER YET!]
[[Eagle|Worm]]
passages.cleanText:
**exxMark
@eon_disappointed_eagle
Cherub 1 grabs the serpent. 
Cherub 1: (text-colour:"deeppink")[Thank you for calling us. I hope he didn't disturb you much with his nonsense.]
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[I'm okay. Thank you for coming.]
The Serpent screams as they take him away:
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[THIS IS NOT OVER YET!]

passages.name: Worm
passages.text:
**apple
@eon_think_eagle
Eon takes a look at the apple.
Reaches and grabs one. Smells it.
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Hmm, smells good.]
Then she sees a worm peeking out of the apple.
[[Eagle|Nah]]
passages.cleanText:
**apple
@eon_think_eagle
Eon takes a look at the apple.
Reaches and grabs one. Smells it.
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Hmm, smells good.]
Then she sees a worm peeking out of the apple.

passages.name: Nah
passages.text:
**peach
@eon_nah_eagle @sfx_whoosh
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Nah!]
And she throws the apple away.
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[I'll just have a peach instead.]
So, she lived in the garden, forever, happily ever after.
@end
passages.cleanText:
**peach
@eon_nah_eagle @sfx_whoosh
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Nah!]
And she throws the apple away.
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[I'll just have a peach instead.]
So, she lived in the garden, forever, happily ever after.
@end

passages.name: Prove
passages.text:
**exxMark
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[You are lying! I don't believe a single thing you say!] @sfx_shortOfBreath @eon_anxious_ox
The serpent seems very confident. 
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[If you are so sure, then prove it. Just take a bite from the apple, and we'll see who is lying.]
Eon is panthing. She can't decide. She knows it's a lie, but she is scared at the same time.
[[Ox|Okay]]
[[Eagle|Before]]
[[Lion|Walk]]
passages.cleanText:
**exxMark
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[You are lying! I don't believe a single thing you say!] @sfx_shortOfBreath @eon_anxious_ox
The serpent seems very confident. 
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[If you are so sure, then prove it. Just take a bite from the apple, and we'll see who is lying.]
Eon is panthing. She can't decide. She knows it's a lie, but she is scared at the same time.

passages.name: Loops
passages.text:
**recycle
@sfx_snake @eon_dance_ox
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[Listen to me, kid, you are stuck in a loop. Living the same day forever. And that is all there to keep you away from the apple. Because if you eat the apple, you'll be awake. And you'll be free from this pretty prison.]
[[Ox|Prove]]
[[Eagle|Apple]]
[[Lion|Away]]

passages.name: Okay
passages.text:
**tick
Eon can't stand the idea that her dad is a liar. She knows he is not.
@eon_disappointed_ox
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Okay! I accept your challenge. I'll eat the apple, and prove to you that my dad is an honest person.]
[[Ox|Decide]]
passages.cleanText:
**tick
Eon can't stand the idea that her dad is a liar. She knows he is not.
@eon_disappointed_ox
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Okay! I accept your challenge. I'll eat the apple, and prove to you that my dad is an honest person.]

passages.name: Walk
passages.text:
**exxMark
@eon_walk_lion
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[We're done here.]
The serpent panics as Eon walks away.
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[No, no! Wait!] 
He jumps and grabs Eon's leg.
[[Lion|Scream]]
passages.cleanText:
**exxMark
@eon_walk_lion
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[We're done here.]
The serpent panics as Eon walks away.
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[No, no! Wait!] 
He jumps and grabs Eon's leg.

passages.name: Warning
passages.text:
**dialog
@eon_disappointed_eagle
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Nothing you say makes any sense to me. I am happy here. And I don't know you. Please leave or I'll call guards.]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[You are not listening! This is not happiness, you are just numb!]
[[Eagle|Guards]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialog
@eon_disappointed_eagle
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Nothing you say makes any sense to me. I am happy here. And I don't know you. Please leave or I'll call guards.]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[You are not listening! This is not happiness, you are just numb!]

passages.name: Scream
passages.text:
**explosion
@eon_scared_lion @sfx_fluteBroken
Eon is scared as hell. She stars screaming. @sfx_scream
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[GET AWAY FROM ME!!!]
In panic, she kicks on the Serpent's head. Multiple times.
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[Arghhhh!!!]
[[Lion|Sorry]]
passages.cleanText:
**explosion
@eon_scared_lion @sfx_fluteBroken
Eon is scared as hell. She stars screaming. @sfx_scream
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[GET AWAY FROM ME!!!]
In panic, she kicks on the Serpent's head. Multiple times.
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[Arghhhh!!!]

passages.name: Sorry
passages.text:
**dead
@eon_surprised_lion @sfx_fluteBroken
Serpent's head is smashed.
Eon looks at him in shock. 
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Omg...Omg, I am so sorry. I didn't mean to...]
Eon realizes there was nothing else to do. So she calls the guards.
[[Lion|Criminal]]
passages.cleanText:
**dead
@eon_surprised_lion @sfx_fluteBroken
Serpent's head is smashed.
Eon looks at him in shock. 
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Omg...Omg, I am so sorry. I didn't mean to...]
Eon realizes there was nothing else to do. So she calls the guards.

passages.name: Criminal
passages.text:
**cry
@eon_cry_lion @sfx_whistleFlute
The cherubs take the Serpent's body away as the chief consolates Eon.
Chief: (text-colour:"deeppink")[It's not your fault. Stop blaming yourself. And you should know that he is an unwelcomed guest we've been looking for everywhere. You actually helped us.]
Eon is in tears.
[[Lion|Gift]]
passages.cleanText:
**cry
@eon_cry_lion @sfx_whistleFlute
The cherubs take the Serpent's body away as the chief consolates Eon.
Chief: (text-colour:"deeppink")[It's not your fault. Stop blaming yourself. And you should know that he is an unwelcomed guest we've been looking for everywhere. You actually helped us.]
Eon is in tears.

passages.name: Gift
passages.text:
**peach
@eon_eat_lion @sfx_bite
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[But what was his crime?]
Chief: (text-colour:"deeppink")[Don't bother yourself with these right now. Here, a delicious peach for you.]
Eon looks at the peach. It reminds him of the dead serpent now. Why did he have to attack her like that.
Then she takes a bite and the juice makes her forget everything.
@end
passages.cleanText:
**peach
@eon_eat_lion @sfx_bite
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[But what was his crime?]
Chief: (text-colour:"deeppink")[Don't bother yourself with these right now. Here, a delicious peach for you.]
Eon looks at the peach. It reminds him of the dead serpent now. Why did he have to attack her like that.
Then she takes a bite and the juice makes her forget everything.
@end

passages.name: Decide
passages.text:
**apple
Eon and the Serpent walks to the apple tree. Eon can barely breathe. 
She grabs an apple from the tree. @eon_anxious_ox
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Looks so shiny and smells really good.]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[I know! So, do you dare to learn the truth?]
[[Ox|Dare]]
[[Eagle|Logic]]
passages.cleanText:
**apple
Eon and the Serpent walks to the apple tree. Eon can barely breathe. 
She grabs an apple from the tree. @eon_anxious_ox
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Looks so shiny and smells really good.]
Serpent: (text-colour:"red")[I know! So, do you dare to learn the truth?]

passages.name: Dare
passages.text:
**apple
Eon is having second thoughts. But she just hates the idea of father lying to her. @eon_eat_ox
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Okay, here I come!]
She she takes a big bite from the apple.
The serpent's smile covers his whole face. Than he disappears.
[[Ox|Hit]]
passages.cleanText:
**apple
Eon is having second thoughts. But she just hates the idea of father lying to her. @eon_eat_ox
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Okay, here I come!]
She she takes a big bite from the apple.
The serpent's smile covers his whole face. Than he disappears.

passages.name: Logic
passages.text:
**think
Eon doesn't say anything. @eon_think_eagle
She is still making calculations in her head.
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[If he is right, somehow, I doubt that would make my life any easier. and it is already beautiful, I love it here.]
[[Eagle|Outcast]]
[[Ox|Dare]]
passages.cleanText:
**think
Eon doesn't say anything. @eon_think_eagle
She is still making calculations in her head.
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[If he is right, somehow, I doubt that would make my life any easier. and it is already beautiful, I love it here.]

passages.name: Hit
passages.text:
**explosion
First she thinks that it's the most beautiful taste she ever sensed.
Then she gets a very sudden headache. As if there were a thousand bombs exploding in her head all at the same time.
She starts screaming. @eon_scared_ox @sfx_explosion
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[ARGHHHHH!!!]
[[Ox|Bent]]
passages.cleanText:
**explosion
First she thinks that it's the most beautiful taste she ever sensed.
Then she gets a very sudden headache. As if there were a thousand bombs exploding in her head all at the same time.
She starts screaming. @eon_scared_ox @sfx_explosion
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[ARGHHHHH!!!]

passages.name: Bent
passages.text:
**explosion
The colors and shapes started to bend. She freaks out and screams louder.
She feels like falling in void. @eon_fall_ox
She loses sense of time. 
Falling for an indefinite time, she finally lands on ground. 
The ground lights up. It becomes so bright that she goes blind.
Her feels her mind is opening up. She is feeling emotions she never felt before. She knows now that dad lied to her.
[[Ox|Crashing]]
passages.cleanText:
**explosion
The colors and shapes started to bend. She freaks out and screams louder.
She feels like falling in void. @eon_fall_ox
She loses sense of time. 
Falling for an indefinite time, she finally lands on ground. 
The ground lights up. It becomes so bright that she goes blind.
Her feels her mind is opening up. She is feeling emotions she never felt before. She knows now that dad lied to her.

passages.name: Crashing
passages.text:
**explosion
She kept crashing into rocks, waves, flowers and spiders. @eon_passedOut_ox
Last thing she saw was a grave of her own. And she didn't know they existed before. 
So, she opens up her eyes again as a different person.
[[Ox|Dizzy]]
passages.cleanText:
**explosion
She kept crashing into rocks, waves, flowers and spiders. @eon_passedOut_ox
Last thing she saw was a grave of her own. And she didn't know they existed before. 
So, she opens up her eyes again as a different person.

passages.name: Dizzy
passages.text:
**exxQuestion
Her head is filled up with so many things that she didn't know existed before. @eon_dizzy_ox
Eon: Oh, my head! It hurts.
As she is trying to get herself up, she realizes the ground is all sand.
Then a soft voice from her back speaks to her.
Adam: (text-colour:"firebrick")[Hey? Are you okay?]
[[Ox|Adam]]
passages.cleanText:
**exxQuestion
Her head is filled up with so many things that she didn't know existed before. @eon_dizzy_ox
Eon: Oh, my head! It hurts.
As she is trying to get herself up, she realizes the ground is all sand.
Then a soft voice from her back speaks to her.
Adam: (text-colour:"firebrick")[Hey? Are you okay?]

passages.name: Adam
passages.text:
**dialog
She looks back in confusion. @eon_confused_ox
It's another person, like her, and they have a comforting expression on his face.
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Who are you?]
Adam: (text-colour:"firebrick")[Oh sorry, I am Adam.] 
[[Ox|Same]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialog
She looks back in confusion. @eon_confused_ox
It's another person, like her, and they have a comforting expression on his face.
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Who are you?]
Adam: (text-colour:"firebrick")[Oh sorry, I am Adam.]

passages.name: Same
passages.text:
**dialog
Adam seems like a friendly person, Eon tells herself. @eon_surprised_ox
Adam: Did you come from the Garden as well?
This question surprised Eon.
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Yes...But how did you know that?]
Adam: (text-colour:"firebrick")[Well...That's also where I came from.]
[[Ox|Answer]]
passages.cleanText:
**dialog
Adam seems like a friendly person, Eon tells herself. @eon_surprised_ox
Adam: Did you come from the Garden as well?
This question surprised Eon.
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Yes...But how did you know that?]
Adam: (text-colour:"firebrick")[Well...That's also where I came from.]

passages.name: Answer
passages.text:
**recycle
Is he telling the truth? That's hard for Eon to tell. @eon_think_ox
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[But...I've never seen you there. How is that possib...]
She realizes that she was actually stuck in a loop just like the Serpent said. Forever. Waking up into the same day over and over again. So, it was possible they missed each other.
Adam's smile is full of compassion.
Adam: (text-colour:"firebrick")[I think you know the answer.]
[[Ox|Loneliness]]
passages.cleanText:
**recycle
Is he telling the truth? That's hard for Eon to tell. @eon_think_ox
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[But...I've never seen you there. How is that possib...]
She realizes that she was actually stuck in a loop just like the Serpent said. Forever. Waking up into the same day over and over again. So, it was possible they missed each other.
Adam's smile is full of compassion.
Adam: (text-colour:"firebrick")[I think you know the answer.]

passages.name: Loneliness
passages.text:
**apple
Adam: (text-colour:"firebrick")[Since I ate the apple, I started to feel emotions that I never had before. Loneliness, feeling alone, that's new and it was very hard to deal with.] @eon_think_ox
Eon doesn't understand how but she somehow knows what loneliness would be like.
Adam: (text-colour:"firebrick")[So, I've been walking around everyday to run into someone, somehow. And today is the day.]
[[Ox|Hungry]]
passages.cleanText:
**apple
Adam: (text-colour:"firebrick")[Since I ate the apple, I started to feel emotions that I never had before. Loneliness, feeling alone, that's new and it was very hard to deal with.] @eon_think_ox
Eon doesn't understand how but she somehow knows what loneliness would be like.
Adam: (text-colour:"firebrick")[So, I've been walking around everyday to run into someone, somehow. And today is the day.]

passages.name: Hungry
passages.text:
**blueApple
~~
Eon is thirsty. At that moment, she realizes they are in the middle of a desert. @eon_confused_ox
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Where are we? This is the middle of nowhere!
Adam: Don't panic! There is a small lake nearby where we can rest, have some water and food.]
Eon's stomach grumbles as Adam is speaking.
Adam: (text-colour:"blue")[Oh, you must be hungry! Here, I have another apple for you.]
He gives Eon a bright blue apple.
[[Ox|Together]]
passages.cleanText:
**blueApple
~~
Eon is thirsty. At that moment, she realizes they are in the middle of a desert. @eon_confused_ox
Eon: (text-colour:"blue")[Where are we? This is the middle of nowhere!
Adam: Don't panic! There is a small lake nearby where we can rest, have some water and food.]
Eon's stomach grumbles as Adam is speaking.
Adam: (text-colour:"blue")[Oh, you must be hungry! Here, I have another apple for you.]
He gives Eon a bright blue apple.

passages.name: Together
passages.text:
**heart
Adam holds Eon's hand. @eon_happy_ox
Adam: (text-colour:"firebrick")[Come on, hold on to me. And we'll make it there together.]
Eon gets up holding on to Adam. It feels good to have someone around, she thinks.
They walk together towards the horizon. They don't let go of each other's hands.
@end
passages.cleanText:
**heart
Adam holds Eon's hand. @eon_happy_ox
Adam: (text-colour:"firebrick")[Come on, hold on to me. And we'll make it there together.]
Eon gets up holding on to Adam. It feels good to have someone around, she thinks.
They walk together towards the horizon. They don't let go of each other's hands.
@end
